sentences: Ma olen viime päevadel väga haige olnud.
Ta on viimased kuud siin elanud.
Viimasel ajal on toimunud palju muutusi.
context: The word 'viime' in Estonian generally refers to something that is last or most recent in a sequence, and it can be used as an adjective to describe nouns or as an adverb to describe verbs.
